item.title: In the Bullpen: Are Data and Analytics Ruining Baseball? [In the Bullpen]
item.description: Have sabermetricians gone to far? Are front offices making players feel like a number? Is there more to baseball, and life, than math and science?
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:summary: Have sabermetricians gone to far? Are front offices making players feel like a number? Is there more to baseball, and life, than math and science?

item.title: In the Bullpen: Will There Be Baseball in 2020? [In the Bullpen]
item.description: Baseball has been shut down indefinitely and only the Lord knows when it will return. We gather “In the Bullpen” to share our memories, dreams, and questions about the future of the great game of baseball.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:summary: Baseball has been shut down indefinitely and only the Lord knows when it will return. We gather “In the Bullpen” to share our memories, dreams, and questions about the future of the great game of baseball.
